column4: how do I stop lucid from constantly asking me my password? for updates , installations, downloads etc i have typed my pw more than 200 times already just today
that's kind of the idea; if you're about to do something that's going to potentially break your box, that's administrative and requires a password
otherwise, some knucklehead can come along when you go to lunch and break stuff willy-nilly.  It's also a reminder "Do I really want to do that?" that's handy sometimes
true; I only type a pass now for updates and in terminals when I'm dorking with system files
